fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-**Chain Grab:** Select a player to attack them with a chain. They will be dealt a basic attack.
-**Fire Slam:** Slam a player on the ground, kausing a shockwave of fire. Their visitors will be notified that they have kaught on fire, and will die if they are not healed (infinite uses, but just wait a night before using again)
-**Flaming Uppercut:** Target a player at night. Their jaw will be shattered and may not speak or whisper during the day. They will then die the next night due to blood loss, unless healed (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You are unable to be doused
- Attackers with no defense will be passively kaught on fire
**X-RAY:** Your attacks are all upgraded to Unstoppable and nothing can be healed
